name: Last One (LucasGP1)
description:
Last One is a platform shooter game. This game is still in development.

Last One will be free forever. Enjoy my game!

Controls:

>WASD or arrow keys for movement

>Space to jump

>Left mouse button to fire

>E to interact

>CTRL+F to enter in fullscreen mode

>ESC to exit the game

>Tab to pause music
